old:
覚者さん、キノザは白竜神殿ほどじゃ
ないにしろ賑やかだろ？
column2:
Arisen, Kinoza is not as busy as the White Dragon Temple
, but it's still busy, right?

old:
そういうとこにゃ、商売のチャンスも
多いってことさ
column2:
There are a lot of business opportunities
in that kind of place.

old:
鉱山へ行くにも森方面へ行くにも
なんせ道具は多い方がいい！
column2:
Whether you are going to the mine or to the forest
the more tools you have, the better!

old:
切らしてるなら補充していきな
じゃんじゃん買ってってくれ
column2:
If you're out, go to
and buy a bunch of stuff.

old:
大浴場のロイは、たまーに奇妙な品を
仕入れてくるんだが
一体ありゃ、どっから手に入れてるんだろなぁ
column2:
Roy from the big bathhouse sometimes gets some strange
items
I wonder where the heck he gets them from
